resources.string: Network unavailable. Please check your network settings.
No network connection. Please check your network settings.

%1$s öğesi %2$s dâhil olmak üzere %3$d izin(ler)i talep ediyor
This is not a Meizu accessory
Notify whenever a public network is available
Let Google location service and other apps scan for networks, even when WLAN is off
Let a WLAN assistant automatically connect to open networks evaluated as high quality

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks, even when WLAN is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
"Apps may scan for nearby networks even when WLAN is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
There was a problem changing the setting
Minimize battery usage when WLAN is on
Turn WLAN on to see available networks
"You don't have permission to change the WLAN network."
Press the WLAN Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your WLAN router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
WPS is being set, which may take up to 2 minutes.
WPS fails to be enabled. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.
Specify the frequency range of operation
There was a problem setting the frequency band.
Type a network prefix of between 0 and 32 digits.
If you disconnect, your connection with %1$s will end.
If you disconnect, your connection with %1$s and %2$s other devices will end.
Do you want to cancel the request to connect with %1$s?

Not connected to file transfer server

Pairing grants access to your contacts and call history when connected.

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?

This is an example of speech synthesis

Allow the bootloader to be unlocked
WARNING: Device protection features will not work on this device while this setting is turned on.
"Select Bluetooth Audio Codec: Bits Per Sample"

"Select Bluetooth Audio LDAC Codec: Playback Quality"
Show options for wireless display certification
Increase WLAN logging level, show per SSID RSSI in WLAN Picker
When enabled, WLAN will be more aggressive in handing over the data connection to mobile, when WLAN signal is low
Allow/Disallow WLAN Roam Scans based on the amount of data traffic present at the interface
Select Logger sizes per log buffer
When we no longer are monitoring with the persistent logger, we are required to erase the logger data resident on your device.
Store logger data persistently on device
Select log buffers to store persistently on device
Always keep mobile data active, even when WLAN is active (for fast network switching).
Use tethering hardware acceleration if available
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification, and read log data.
Revoke access to USB debugging from all computers you’ve previously authorized?
These settings are intended for development use only. They can cause your device and the applications on it to break or misbehave.
Check apps installed via ADB/ADT for harmful behavior.
Bluetooth devices without names (MAC addresses only) will be displayed
Disables the Bluetooth absolute volume feature in case of volume issues with remote devices such as unacceptably loud volume or lack of control.
Allow ringtones on the phone to be played on Bluetooth headsets
Enable terminal app that offers local shell access
Debugged application waits for debugger to attach before executing
TelephonyMonitor will collect logs when it detects a problem with telephony/modem functionality and prompt notification to user to file a bug
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread
Screen overlay showing current touch data
Flash entire window surfaces when they update
Flash views inside windows when drawn with the GPU
Flash hardware layers green when they update
Always use GPU for screen compositing
Disable automatic routing to USB audio peripherals
Force screen layout direction to RTL for all locales
Force use of GPU for 2d drawing
Enable 4x MSAA in OpenGL ES 2.0 apps
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves
Show App Not Responding dialog for background apps
Displays on-screen warning when an app posts a notification without a valid channel
Makes any app eligible to be written to external storage, regardless of manifest values
Make all activities resizable for multi-window, regardless of manifest values.
Enable support for experimental freeform windows.

%s varsayılan Telefon uygulamanız olarak ayarlansın mı?
%s arama yapabilecek ve aramaların her şeyini kontrol edebilecek. Sadece güvendiğiniz uygulamalar, varsayılan Telefon uygulaması olarak ayarlanmalıdır.
Engellenen numaralardan gelen aramaları veya kısa mesajları almayacaksınız.
Şu numaradan gelen aramaları ve kısa mesajları engelle:
Yalnızca cihaz sahibi engellenen numaraları görüntüleyebilir ve yönetebilir.
Bir acil durum numarasını çevirmenizin veya acil durum numarasına kısa mesaj göndermenizin ardından acil durum hizmetlerinin size ulaşabilmesi için engelleme kapatılır.
